messages.subject: Today
messages.msgSnippet: Zak just told me today was the best day he s ever had.  This morning he and Max (with Steve) went for a playdate at my friend Hilarys .  She had 3 boys, so
messages.messageBody:
Zak just told me today was the best day he's ever had. This morning he and
Max (with Steve) went for a playdate at my friend Hilarys'. She had 3 boys,
so with 5 of them playing and screaming and running around Steve said it was
wonderful to see them all together. Hilary decided to join us this
afternoon with her 3 boys at the Homeschooling Skating Afternoon. They all
had such a good time. Steve had booked the boys to go to JW Tumbles for 4
hours where they played on all the jungle gym equipment, watched Chicken
Run, had pizza, played games and generally had a great time. Steve and I
went out to a quiet grown up dinner and to the movies to see Phone Booth
(which by the way is an excellent movie).. On the way home we rolled all the
windows down in the car and turned the music up loud (remember it's AZ we
live in so it's about 65 degrees at night).. Zak heard the song from the
movie Spirit "I'm already there" and we all sat in the garage in the front
seat with the volume up extra loud and sang the song. The boys went
straight to bed and Steve and I are checking out e-mails.



What a great day they had. and us too..



Dawn F.

Tucson, AZ







[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
